protocol.name: P-G3865-1
protocol.text: Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old light grown  csn4-1 mutant seedlings were collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3865-2
protocol.text: Approximately 80 mg from 7 day old light grown CSN4-1 in Col wild type seedlings were collected and ground to a fine powder under liquid Nitrogen. Samples were lysed in separate groups in RLT buffer (Qiagen).Total RNA was extracted from the tissue lysate using an RNeasy kit (Qiagen).

protocol.name: P-G3865-3
protocol.text: Approximately 6 Â¼g of total RNA was processed to produce biotinylated cRNA targets.
